text:
The Secret Ravine is located near the Tan Hoon Siang Mist House and the Sembcorp Cool House at National Orchid Garden within the Singapore Botanic Gardens.

It has rare orchids and ferns that grow in the ground or the crevices of rocks. It is named after the habitats that can be found in deep, narrow valleys of tropical mountains.
Cooled orchid house, state of the art in design and presentation.
